text: Mohamed Ezzat Ahmed Shafiq Abou Aouf (; 21 August 1948 – 1 July 2019) was an Egyptian actor and composer. Abou Aouf obtained his bachelor degree in medicine. His acting debut was in 1992 in Ice Cream in Gleam (Ays Krim fi Glym) with the Egyptian singer Amr Diab. == References == Category:1948 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Place of birth missing Category:Place of death missing Category:20th-century Egyptian artists Category:Egyptian composers Category:Egyptian male actors
title: Ezzat Abou Aouf
